means: 苯坐卡因，对氨基苯（甲）酸乙酯
本坐卡因；麻因；阿萘司台辛；氨苯甲酸乙酯

word_mean: 〔USP〕苯佐卡因，对氨苯甲酸乙酯：局部麻醉药，C9H11NO2，为白色结晶或白色结晶粉末，局部用于皮肤和粘膜

sentence.Network_en: ANESTHETICS: Benzocaine, pramoxine, and antipyrine relieve pain and pruritus.
sentence.Network_cn: 麻醉剂: 苯佐卡因, pramoxine, 和安减轻疼痛和瘙痒.

sentence.Network_en: Objective: To improve the preparation of benzocaine.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要目的: 对苯佐卡因的合成工艺进行探索.

sentence.Network_en: Anesthetics in low doses, or local anesthetics such as benzocaine, are also analgesic in function.
sentence.Network_cn: 少剂量的麻醉剂, 或局部麻醉剂如苯坐卡因在功能上也可用作止痛药.
